sections.heading: with picketing; penalty.(1) A person commits the offense of interfering with picketing if, acting separately or with others, he interferes with any picketing not described as mass picketing in section 28-1318, except that this provision shall not apply to duly qualified peace officers or to court ac
sections.text: with picketing; penalty.(1) A person commits the offense of interfering with picketing if, acting separately or with others, he interferes with any picketing not described as mass picketing in section 28-1318, except that this provision shall not apply to duly qualified peace officers or to court action.(2) Interfering with picketing is a Class III misdemeanor. Each violation shall constitute a separate offense.SourceLaws 1977, LB 38, ยง 303.
